Sentencas: A mathematical model has been developed that describes the potential distribution along the length of a tubular fuel cell.
Titulo: Losses resulting from in-plane electricity conduction in tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Insight into this distribution is essential because, as opposed to the planar fuel cell, the electricity has to be transported over a relatively long distance before connecting to the next cell.
Titulo: Losses resulting from in-plane electricity conduction in tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The model is based on an electrical network representation of the fuel cell and consists of resistors parallel and perpendicular to the plane cross section of the cell.
Titulo: Losses resulting from in-plane electricity conduction in tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The first result from the electrochemical process as would take place in any fuel cell.
Titulo: Losses resulting from in-plane electricity conduction in tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The second constitute losses resulting from electricity transport along the electrodes.
Titulo: Losses resulting from in-plane electricity conduction in tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The model leads to a differential equation, which is solved numerically.
Titulo: Losses resulting from in-plane electricity conduction in tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The modelling results show that in order to achieve high outputs there is a requirement to reduce electrolyte wall thickness and to limit the active length due to in-plane losses (C) 2000 Elsevier Science B.V. All rights reserved.
Titulo: Losses resulting from in-plane electricity conduction in tubular solid oxide fuel cells
